dataList.dlg: Right, I—I am… Wait, you’re not the superior… What?
I’m busy at this time of day. Don’t talk to me. Oh… Where’d I put my book?
Heretics shall be pur— Gah. What’d I just say? Bugger… This keeps happening after meals.
Wonder if I can get to sleep on time tonight… You should sleep while you can.
Enough gabbing at me. I need this passage to stick in my head, and you aren’t helping.
Hope I can get a proper meal someday. I’m sick of opening those cans of mushy stuff…
Heret—! Ah, bloody… Won’t you take off that minging mask? I almost killed you!
My eyes look all sunken…? Yeah, I didn’t get my sleep. They made me recite the book all night for being five minutes late to the last gathering.
I am… a hammer… He who shall be gripped… to pound the filth away…
…No one around? Guess a… short break can’t hurt.
Me…? No, don’t think I deserve to get all this… Not like I can refuse if you mean it.
Aye! Oh… Right.
Haaa… It’s time.
What is it now…
“Puri…fy.” Was that how it goes?
Eliminate the heretic…
…Gah! Where am…
…Another one goes.
Dammit… Catherine…
I did as I was told.
I did as I was told, yet…
Are we… heading back now?
If I keep up… I’ll be able to go back one day, right?
No, it can’t! I—If I head back like this… Nrgh!
